```{r setup}

```

Read in the gene expression data
```{r}
tcc_primary_expression<-readRDS("../../data.derived/tcc-primary-expression.RDS")
```

```{r}
source("HuRSTAPredictor.R")
```

Run the predictor against the expression data.
```{r}
rsi<-predict.hursta.rsi.rank(tcc_primary_expression)
rownames(rsi)<-rsi[,1]
rsi<-rsi[,2,drop=F]
```

Save the result out
```{r}
saveRDS(rsi,file="../../data.derived/rsi.RDS")
```
